item.title: Me
item.description: I’m not fronted or backend. I’m not DevOps or SRE. I’m not Developer or Architect. I love software in any shape or form. I love the fact that I can “materialize” ideas with it. I love problems and I love challenges. ‚ù§üë®‚Äçüíª
